title: 188 - Leviticus, Sex, and Women in Leadership - With Sophie Cherry
description:
My friend Sophie joins the show to answer listener questions: What has been Sophie's experience as a woman in the church and the pushback involved with female leadership? How has the #MeToo movement effected the church? How did Jesus, and how do we, handle what Leviticus says about sex? Thanks for listening! 

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com
